buildCommand: if [ -f package.json ] && grep -q '"vercel-build"' package.json; then npm install && npm run vercel-build; elif [ -d frontend ]; then npm install --prefix frontend && npm run --prefix frontend vercel-build; else echo "Unable to locate frontend project"; exit 1; fi; if [ -d frontend/dist ]; then rm -rf dist && cp -R frontend/dist dist; fi
